thread.title: BRIEF-Chengdu Information Technology of Chinese Academy of Sciences says 2017 dividend payment

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Chengdu Information Technology of Chinese Academy of Sciences says 2017 dividend payment

organizations.name: brief-chengdu information technology of chinese academy of sciences
chengdu information technology of chinese academy of sciences co ltd

text:
April 25(Reuters) - Chengdu Information Technology of Chinese Academy of Sciences Co Ltd
* Says it plans to pay cash dividend of 0.5 yuan per 10 shares (before tax) and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 8 new shares for every 10 shares to shareholders for 2017
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/vzGzuh
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
